SEARCH
Package org.codehaus.mojo.versions

Class ResolveRangesMojo

java.lang.Object
org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsUpdaterMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.AbstractVersionsDependencyUpdaterMojo
org.codehaus.mojo.versions.ResolveRangesMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
@Mojo(name="resolve-ranges", threadSafe=true) public class ResolveRangesMojo extends AbstractVersionsDependencyUpdaterMojo
Attempts to resolve dependency version ranges to the specific version being used in the build. For example a version range of "[1.0, 1.2)" would be resolved to the specific version currently in use "1.1".
Since:
1.0-alpha-3
Author:
Paul Gier
